```{r theme_pst}
library(showtext)
#> Loading required package: sysfonts
#> Loading required package: showtextdb
pstFont = "Montserrat"
font_add_google(pstFont)
showtext_auto()
theme_pst <- function(baseSize=8) {
  (theme(
                       axis.line.x = element_line(
                         colour = "#182125",
                         size = 0.5,
                         linetype = "solid"
                       ),
                       axis.line.y = element_line(
                         colour = "#182125",
                         size = 0.5,
                         linetype = "solid"
                       ),
                       axis.ticks.y = element_line(
                         colour = "#182125",
                         size = 0.5,
                         linetype = "solid"
                       ),
                       text = element_text(family = pstFont),
                       axis.text = element_text(colour = "#8C9394",
                                                size = baseSize * .8),
                       axis.title = element_text(colour ="black", size= baseSize),
                       panel.grid.minor.y = element_line(linetype = "dotted", 
                                                         colour = "#C4C8C6"),
                       panel.grid.major.y = element_line(colour = "#394C56", 
                                                         linetype = "dotted"),
                       panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(),
                       panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank(),
                       panel.background = element_blank(),
                       panel.border = element_blank(),
                       strip.background = element_rect(linetype = 0),
                       strip.text = element_blank(),
                       strip.text.x = element_blank(),
                       strip.text.y = element_blank(),
                       legend.text = element_text(colour = "black",
                                                  size = baseSize * .8),
                       legend.background = element_rect(fill = NULL, 
                                                        color = "#182125"),
                       legend.title = element_text( face = "bold", 
                                                    colour = "black",
                                                    size = baseSize),
                       legend.position = "right",
                       legend.key = element_blank(),
                       #legend.background = element_blank(),
                       plot.tag.position = c(.97,.97),
                       plot.tag = element_text(size = baseSize *.66,
                                               colour = "#8C9394"),
                       plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#ffffff"),
                       plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", 
                                                 colour = "black",
                                                 size = baseSize*1.2),
                       plot.subtitle = element_text(colour = "#8C9394",
                                                    size = baseSize),
                       plot.caption = element_text(size = baseSize *.8)
                     )
  )
}
```

```{r loading data}
ocsp <- c("CA","WA","OR")
ocsat <- c("")
#all incident data + op mileage
df <- read_csv(paste0(datadir, "clean/all_inc.csv") ) %>%
  mutate(STATE = if_else(grepl("Outer Continental Shelf", cleanLoc), 
                         if_else(STATE %in% ocsp, "OCSP", 
                                 if_else(LOCATION_LONGITUDE < -81.32, "OCSAT",
                                         "OCSG")),
                         STATE))

miles <- read_csv(paste0(datadir, "clean/sys_miles.csv")) 


## getting mileage data 
# hl
hlMiles <- read.csv(paste0(datadir, "raw/HL_MilesDecadeAge.csv"))

curHLM <- hlMiles %>% 
  filter(Calendar.Year == max(Calendar.Year))

sum(curHLM$Total.Miles.by.Decade, na.rm = T)

# gt gg ungs
gtguMiles <- read.csv(paste0(datadir, "raw/GT_MilesDecadeAge.csv"))

curGT <- gtguMiles %>%
  filter(Calendar.Year == max(Calendar.Year))

sum(curGT$Total.By.Decade.Miles, na.rm = T)

# gd
gdMiles <- read.csv(paste0(datadir, "raw/GD_MilesDecadeAge.csv"))

curGD <- gdMiles %>%
  filter(Calendar.Year == max(Calendar.Year))

sum(curGD$Total.Miles.by.Decade, na.rm = T)


# all miles 
miles <- read.csv(paste0(datadir, "clean/sys_miles.csv"))
```

```{r add old data to df}
  select(IYEAR, ACSTATE, SIGNIFICANT, SERIOUS, MAP_CAUSE, FATAL) %>%
  mutate(SYS = "HL")

  filter(IYEAR > 2001, OFFSHORE == "NO")#%>%
  select(IYEAR, ACSTATE, SIGNIFICANT, SERIOUS, MAP_CAUSE, FATAL) %>%
  mutate(SYS = "HL")

  filter(OFFSHORE == "NO")#%>%
  select(IYEAR, ACSTATE, SIGNIFICANT, SERIOUS, MAP_CAUSE, FATAL) %>%
  mutate(SYS = "HL")

  select(IYEAR, ACSTATE, SIGNIFICANT, SERIOUS, MAP_CAUSE, FATAL) %>%
  mutate(SYS = "GD")

  mutate(IYEAR = year(mdy(IDATE)))%>%
  filter(IYEAR > 2001) %>%
  select(IYEAR, ACCST, SIGNIFICANT, SERIOUS, MAP_CAUSE, FAT) %>%
  rename(ACSTATE = ACCST,

  mutate(SYS = "GD")
```

## Briefing Paper 6

```{r sig onshore dash}
mainSYS <- c("HL","GT","GD")

es_labs <- c("Distribución de Gas", 
             "Transmisión de Gas",
             "Líquidos Peligrosos")

es_dist <- c(`GD` = "Distribución de Gas", 
             `GT` = "Transmisión de Gas",
             `HL` = "Líquidos Peligrosos")
  
sigon_dash <- dfBig %>%
  filter(SIGNIFICANT == "YES", SYS %in% mainSYS)%>%
  count(SYS, IYEAR) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = IYEAR, y = n, group = SYS, color = SYS, fill = SYS))+
  geom_smooth(method = "glm", alpha = .3, linewidth = .5, linetype = "dashed")+
  geom_line(linewidth = .75)+
  scale_color_manual(values = pst1,
                     labels = c("Gas Distribution","Gas Transmission","Hazardous Liquids")
                     )+
  scale_fill_manual(values = pst1,
                     labels = c("Gas Distribution","Gas Transmission","Hazardous Liquids")
                     )+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(2002,2021,2))+
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(10,190),
                     breaks = seq(20,180, 40))+
  theme_pst()+
  theme(legend.direction = "horizontal",
        legend.position = c(0.4,0.1))
  
sigon +
  labs(title = "Significant Pipeline Incidents",
        subtitle = "Onshore Pipeline Systems (2010-2021)",
        y = "Significant Incidents",
         color = "System",
       fill = "System",
       x = "Year",
        tag = tag,
        caption = capt)


ggsave("plots/en/AllSig_EN.pdf", width = wdt, height = hgt, units = "in")


sigon +
  scale_color_manual(values = pst1,
                     labels = es_labs
                     )+
  scale_fill_manual(values = pst1,
                     labels = es_labs
                     )+
  labs(title = "Incidentes principales en las tuberías",
        subtitle = "Sistemas de tuberías en tierra firme (2010-2021)",
        y = "Incidentes significativos",
         color = "Sistema",
       fill = "Sistema",
       x = "Año",
        tag = tag,
        caption = "Fuente: Datos de incidentes y millaje de la PHMSA (2023)")+
  theme(legend.position.inside = c(0.45,0.1))

ggsave("plots/es/AllSig_ES.pdf", width = wdt, height = hgt, units = "in")

```

```{r sig incident causes}
#### BY CAUSE
## bars 
cause_p <- dfBig %>%
  filter(SIGNIFICANT == "YES", SYS != "UNGS")%>%
  count(SYS, MAP_CAUSE) %>%
  complete(SYS, MAP_CAUSE, fill = list(n = 0))%>%
  group_by(SYS)%>%
  mutate(total = sum(n))%>%
  ungroup()%>%
  mutate(prop = n/total,
         MAP_CAUSE = str_wrap(str_to_title(MAP_CAUSE), width = 14))%>%
  ggplot(aes(x = reorder(MAP_CAUSE, n), y = prop, fill = reorder(SYS,-total)))+
  geom_bar(position = "dodge", stat = "identity")+
  theme_pst()+
  theme(panel.grid.minor.x = element_line(linetype = "dotted", 
                                                         colour = "#C4C8C6"),
        panel.grid.major.x = element_line(colour = "#394C56", 
                                          linetype = "dotted"),
        panel.grid.major.y = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor.y = element_blank(),
        legend.position = "right"
        )+
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent_format(), expand = c(0,0), limits = c(0,.45))+
  scale_fill_manual(values = pstNew, name = "System", 
                    labels = rev(pstLabEN),
```

```{r}
ecd_ser <- dfBig %>%
  rename(CAUSE = MAP_CAUSE)%>%
  filter(SERIOUS == "YES") %>%
  mutate(period = case_when(IYEAR >= 2012 ~ "Post-2012",
                            IYEAR < 2012 ~ "Pre-2012")) %>%
  group_by(period)%>%
  mutate(inc = n())%>%
  ungroup()%>%
  group_by(period, CAUSE)%>%
  summarise(causeInc = n(),
            inc = inc) %>% 
  distinct(period, CAUSE, .keep_all = T)%>%
  mutate(percent = causeInc/inc)%>%
  select(!c(causeInc, inc))%>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = c("period"),
              values_from = c("percent"))%>%
  mutate(class = "Serious")%>%
  rbind(exSig) %>% 
  left_join(cause_es)%>%
  mutate( class = factor(class, levels = c("Significant","Serious")),
          en = factor(en, levels = order)) %>%
  filter(class == "Serious")%>%
  ggplot()+
  geom_segment(aes(x = fct_rev(en),
                   xend = fct_rev(en), 
                   y = `Pre-2012`,
                   yend = `Post-2012`), alpha = .8)+
  geom_point(aes(x = en, y = `Post-2012`, color = "Post-2012"),

  geom_point(aes(x = en, y = `Pre-2012`, color = "Pre-2012"),
```

```{r diff en dash}
  left_join(hlHCA, by = c("IYEAR" = "IYEAR", "name" = "HCA")) %>% 
  mutate(rate = n/value) %>%
  pivot_wider(id_cols = "IYEAR",

  mutate(diff = YES - NO,
         System = "HL")%>%
  rbind(

      select(IYEAR, HCA, nonHCA)%>%
      pivot_longer(!IYEAR)%>%
      mutate(name = if_else(name == "HCA", "YES", "NO"),
             value = value/1000) %>%
      left_join(gtHCA, by = c("IYEAR" = "IYEAR", "name" = "HCA")) %>% 
      mutate(rate = n/value) %>%
      pivot_wider(id_cols = "IYEAR",
                  values_from = "rate")  %>% 
      mutate(diff = YES - NO,
             System = "GT")
  )%>%
  ggplot(aes(x = IYEAR, y = diff, color = System, fill = System))+
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, color = "Gray10")+
  geom_smooth(method = "glm", alpha = .3, size = .33, linetype = "dashed")+
  geom_line(size = .66)+
  annotate("text",x = 2004.7, y = .15, label = "Getting Worse →",angle = 90 ,size = 2.4, fontface = "bold")+

  scale_x_continuous(expand = expansion(add = c(.5,0)))+
  coord_cartesian(clip = "off", ylim = c(-.25,.6))+
  theme_pst(baseSize = 8)+

       caption = "Incident Rate = Incidents per 1,000 Miles\n
                  Source: PHMSA Annual Reports, Flagged Files, and Mileage Data (2005-Present)",

       x = "Year")
```

```{r diff es no dash}
      select(IYEAR, HCA, nonHCA)%>%
      pivot_longer(!IYEAR)%>%
      mutate(name = if_else(name == "HCA", "YES", "NO"),
             value = value/1000) %>%
      left_join(gtHCA, by = c("IYEAR" = "IYEAR", "name" = "HCA")) %>% 
      mutate(rate = n/value) %>%
      pivot_wider(id_cols = "IYEAR",
                  values_from = "rate")  %>% 
      mutate(diff = YES - NO,
             System = "GT")
  )%>%
  ggplot(aes(x = IYEAR, y = diff, color = System, fill = System))+
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, color = "Gray10")+
  geom_smooth(method = "glm", alpha = .3, linewidth = 0 , linetype = 0)+
  geom_line(size = .66)+
  annotate("text",x = 2004.7, y = .15, label = "Empeorando →",angle = 90 ,size = 2.4, fontface = "bold")+
  annotate("text",x = 2004.7, y = -.15, label = "← Mejorando ",angle = 90 , size = 2.4, fontface = "bold")+
  scale_color_manual(values = pst1, labels = es_dist)+
  scale_fill_manual(values = pst1, labels = es_dist)+
  scale_x_continuous(expand = expansion(add = c(.5,0)))+
  coord_cartesian(clip = "off", ylim = c(-.25,.6))+
  theme_pst(baseSize = 8)+
  theme(legend.position = c(0.15,0.8),
        plot.caption = element_text(lineheight = .5))+
  labs(title = "Tasas de incidentes de las HCA por sistema",
       subtitle = "Diferencia en la tasa de las no HCA para los años disponibles",
       tag = tag,
       caption = "Tasa de incidentes = incidentes por cada 1.000 millas\n
                  Fuente: Informes Anuales de la PHMSA, archivos marcados y datos del millaje (2006 al presente) ",
       y = "Diferencia en la tasa de incidentes ",
       color = "Sistema",
       fill = "Sistema",
       x = "Año")

ggsave("plots/es/HCADiff_New_ES.pdf", width = wdt, height = hgt, units = "in", dpi = 300)
```
